en: Explain why living things need water, air and food.
zh: 解释为什么有生命的东西需要水、空气和食物。
hints: Water helps transport and grow.
Air provides gases needed for life.

en: Classify: salmon, eagle, butterfly, cat into groups (animal/plant/fungus).
zh: 把 salmon, eagle, butterfly, cat 分类（动物/植物/真菌）。
hints: Look at how each one gets food and grows.
Some are animals, some are plants, some are fungi.

en: Give one everyday object made of rubber and describe one property it has.
zh: 举一个由 rubber 做成的物品，并写出它的一个性质。
hints: Think of school or home objects.
Use property words like strong/flexible/transparent.

en: Write the life cycle stages of a mosquito in order.
zh: 按顺序写出 mosquito 的生命周期阶段。
hints: Start from egg if it hatches from eggs.
Use arrows to show order.

zh: 解释为什么有生命的东西需要水、空气和食物。
hints: Water helps transport and grow.
Air provides gases needed for life.

en: Classify: butterfly, frog, mushroom, salmon into groups (animal/plant/fungus).
zh: 把 butterfly, frog, mushroom, salmon 分类（动物/植物/真菌）。
hints: Look at how each one gets food and grows.
Some are animals, some are plants, some are fungi.

en: Give one everyday object made of plastic and describe one property it has.
zh: 举一个由 plastic 做成的物品，并写出它的一个性质。
hints: Think of school or home objects.
Use property words like strong/flexible/transparent.
